name: Cops and Robbers (zeeshanbaig)
description:
Thank you for playing Cops and Robbers!

In this endless runner game, you play as bank robber moments after robbing a bank! Avoid traffic and run away from the cops to increase your heist score.

Use the UP or DOWN arrow keys to move.

Note: This game and its development were part of a school project.

References

Tutorials (Game, Health, Camera) - Blackthornprod and Yifat Shaik

Parallax Background - RavenTale

Some Graphics - Royalty Free Stock Images

Code Help - Unity and Discord Forums

Music - Bad Boys (Instrumental) by Inner Circle, uploaded by Sergan Satır

Sound Effects - Royalty Free Stock Sounds

Font - Bulletproof
